  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ClientSocket getInstance()
      Singleton pattern method to get the instance of ClientSocket. Returns the existing instance of the class.

    • run

      public void run()
      Starts a new thread to continuously read incoming messages from the server. Each received message is cast to ServerToClient and its update method is called.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • sendPong

      public void sendPong()
      Sends a PongUpdate message to the server. This is used to acknowledge a "ping" request from the server.
      Specified by:
      sendPong in interface ClientHandler

    • getNick

      public String getNick()
      Returns the client's nickname. No parameters are required.
      Specified by:
      getNick in interface ClientHandler
      Returns:
      The nickname of the client.

    • sendObject

      public void sendObject(ClientToServer message)
      Sends a ClientToServer message to the server. The message is sent using the TCP protocol.
      Specified by:
      sendObject in interface ClientHandler
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send

    • newGame

      public void newGame(int Gameid, int playerNum, TokenColor value)
      Sends a NewGame message to the server. The game ID and number of players are sent to the server.
      Specified by:
      newGame in interface ClientHandler
      Parameters:
      Gameid - the game ID
      playerNum - the number of players
      value - the player's token color

    • joinGame

      public void joinGame(int Gameid, TokenColor value)
      Sends a JoinGame message to the server. The game ID is sent to the server.
      Specified by:
      joinGame in interface ClientHandler
      Parameters:
      Gameid - the game ID
      value - the player's token color

      public void requestUpdate(Boolean playing)
      Sends a RequestUpdate message to the server. The playing status is sent to the server.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • joinUpdate

      public void joinUpdate()
      Sends a JoinUpdate message to the server. No parameters are required.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • playCard

      public void playCard(int i, int x, int y)
      Sends a PlayCard message to the server. The card index and coordinates are sent to the server.
      Specified by:
      playCard in interface ClientHandler
      Parameters:
      i - the card index
      x - The x-coordinate of the card.
      y - The y-coordinate of the card.
